info.author: Omer Trajman
info.description:
PYT is a 250 (ish) line pure python script that provides all the tools necessary
to do HTML, XML, or, in fact, any kind of templating.  PYT is easy to invoke
from many circumstances and uses PHP like embedding within the template.  PYT
has a very small command set and uses python-like primitives.
info.name: PYthon-Template
info.summary: Simple templating (HTML, XML, etc) language for Python
info.html_description: PYT is a 250 (ish) line pure python script that provides all the tools necessary to do HTML, XML, or, in fact, any kind of templating. PYT is easy to invoke from many circumstances and uses PHP like embedding within the template. PYT has a very small command set and uses python-like primitives.
